Age of Steam Expansion: 1830's Pennsylvania / Northern California

Android: Netrunner – A Study in Static
BGO Extended 2.0 expansion (fan expansion for Through the Ages)
Blockers!
item.comment: There is winning strategy - place all of your tiles on the edges of the board and you won`t lose until somebody will do everything to destroy you.

item.name: Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game
Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game – Ancient Horrors Asylum Pack
Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game – The Mountains of Madness Asylum Pack
Cleopatra and the Society of Architects
Co-Mix
item.comment: I rarely comment games, but here I must write something. The game was an open door which led our party to new level of imagination. Friends of mine were amazed that they have hidden so great potential to tell stories. I was amazed how great things I can tell just using few images... and was embarassed when my story was the weakest of all told... and happy at the same time that I can appreciate stories of other players. Mr designer, this what you did with scoring in this game is simply brilliant.
